00140 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00141 {
00142        if (m_isGridVisible != state){
00143               m_isGridVisible = state;
00144               InvalidateBackground();
00145        }
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetMinGridDistance(double gridDistance)
00150 {
00151        if (m_minGridDistance != gridDistance){
00152               m_minGridDistance = gridDistance;
00153               if (m_isGridVisible){
00154                      SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00155               }
00156        }
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00161 {
00162        if (m_isGridInMm != state){
00163               m_isGridInMm = state;
00164               SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00165        }
00166 }
